metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2979 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
FreeBSD NSD before 3.2.13 allows remote attackers to crash a NSD childserver process (SIGSEGV) and cause a denial of service in the NSD server.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2979` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nsd - 4.0.0-5
nsd3 - 4.0.0-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nsd package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.0-5').
